betterquesting:10.desc:8:
On the very top of the Tower you find the largest, §oloudest§r Ghast you have ever seen. Strange contraptions, and collections of smaller ghastlings you encountered repeatedly throughout the tower guarding(?) them, hide in the damaged side rooms.

You're sure there's some sort of secret to the mechanism that would allow someone to fight this Ur-Ghast sword to tentacle, but you didn't pursue Thaumaturgy to whack things repeatedly with glorified sharp sticks, so that can be for another daring adventurer to find out.

Once the Ur-Ghast falls silent at long freaking last, a chest with the spoils of your kill appears in the center of the impromptu arena. Beats having to scour the Tower, the forest canopy or the tower clearing for them, so you're not complaining.

The Fiery Tears of the Ur-Ghast don't have the regenerative properties that the Hydra's blood did, but they possess fantastic potential all the same. Who needs regeneration when channeling entire nodes worth of Vis doesn't bother you at all.

With this fiery adventure behind you the next step is to head to the forest covered in a blanket of snow.
